pageContext.claim: “Just fired Agent Strzok, formerly of the FBI, was in charge of the Crooked Hillary Clinton sham investigation. It was a total fraud on the American public and should be properly redone!”
pageContext.analysis: Former FBI agent Peter Strzok sent anti-Trump text messages in 2016 and was criticized by the Justice Department's inspector general. But the IG report also found that no improper biases or considerations went into the FBI's decision making in 2016. Strzok led a team of investigators looking into Clinton's use of a private email server. The FBI found it did not merit criminal charges.
